groups.name: app.dynamic-query
groups.description: Configuration properties for Spring Dynamic Query Starter.

properties.name: app.dynamic-query.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable dynamic query functionality.

properties.name: app.dynamic-query.preload-enabled
properties.description: Enable preloading of SQL queries at application startup.

properties.name: app.dynamic-query.base-path
properties.description: Base path for SQL query files.

properties.name: app.dynamic-query.scan-packages
properties.description: List of packages to scan for SQL query YAML files.

properties.name: app.dynamic-query.yaml-extension
properties.description: File extension for YAML query files.

properties.name: app.dynamic-query.encoding
properties.description: Character encoding for reading query files.

properties.name: app.dynamic-query.cache-size
properties.description: Maximum number of queries to cache.

properties.name: app.dynamic-query.logging.enabled
properties.description: Enable detailed logging of query execution.

properties.name: app.dynamic-query.logging.log-parameters
properties.description: Log query parameters (be careful with sensitive data).

properties.name: app.dynamic-query.validation.strict-mode
properties.description: Enable strict validation of query files and parameters.

properties.name: app.dynamic-query.validation.validate-at-startup
properties.description: Validate all queries at application startup.
